We're Getting Married!

Saturday, July 11th, 2015

Ceremony at 5:30pm with reception to follow

at

Stonefire Station, Barboursville, VA

5361 Spotswood Trail

Barboursville, VA 22923

Our Story

We met in the summer of 2011 through our local swing dancing scene, and struck up a friendship in spite of the odd-looking vibram five-finger shoes Scott was wearing. After bonding over fall TV programs, wine tasting excursions with friends, and karaoke parties, we departed for Christmas break. Fast forward to New Year’s Eve, when, after a night of singing and enjoying the apple pie moonshine Scott had brought up from North Carolina, the clock struck midnight. It was then that we decided to begin the new year as a couple.

Since that night, we have been inseparable (aside from Karen moving to NC for grad school), adopting our wonderful dog Shiloh, playing board games and video games, developing our Balboa skills, and cooking delicious foods.

Our Proposal

In August of 2014, Karen and Scott went on vacation to the mountains of North Carolina. After a day of whitewater rafting and ziplining through the forest canopy, Scott got down on one knee and proposed to Karen on the porch of their cabin.

The Venue

The ceremony and reception will take place at Stonefire Station in Barboursville, VA, a remodeled and repurposed fire station.

Cocktails and Reception will follow immediately.

There is abundant parking available on-site.

Stonefire Station, 5361 Spotswood Trail, Barboursville, VA 22923

Visiting Charlottesville? Here are a few of our favorite places around the area.

  • Maya

  • Tavola
  • Bang
  • Mas
  • Beer Run
  • Chipotle

Vineyards and Breweries

  • Blue Mountain Brewery - 9519 Critzers Shop Road, Afton, VA 22920
  • Devil’s Backbone Brewpub - 200 Mosbys Run, Roseland, VA 22967
  • Champion Brewing Company - 324 6th St. SE, Charlottesville, VA
  • Three Notch’d Brewing Company - 946 Grady Ave, Charlottesville, VA 22903
  • Veritas Vineyard and Winery - 151 Veritas Lane, Afton, Virginia 22920, GPS Address: 145 Saddleback Farm
  • Afton Mountain Vineyards - 234 Vineyard Lane, Afton, VA 22920

  • Ash Lawn-Highland

  • University of Virginia - especially the gardens
  • Downtown Charlottesville
  • Skyline Drive
